description:
Equip this outfit to cosplay as Rui Fumizuki, the heroine of AKIBA'S TRIP: Hellbound & Debriefed.
This DLC will unlock the outfit for purchase in-game.

This DLC includes the following costume items:
White Rose (weapon)
Rui's Coat (upper wear)
Rui's Skirt (lower wear)
Rui's Underwear (underwear)
Rui's Boots (footwear)

*You will need the base game (sold separately) and the latest version of the software to use this DLC.
name: Rui Fumizuki's Outfit
